title: John Hart-Down River
description:
John Hart-Down River

Down River is the winner of the 2008 Edgar Award for Best Novel.
Everything that shaped him happened near that riverâ€¦.

Now its banks are filled with lies and greed, shame, and murderâ€¦.

John Hartâ€™s debut, The King of Lies, was compelling and lyrical, with Janet Maslin of The New York Times declaring, â€œThere hasnâ€™t been a thriller as showily literate since Scott Turow came along.â€ Now, in Down River, Hart makes a scorching return to Rowan County, where he drives his characters to the edge, explores the dark side of human nature
